name.title: Dataset Name
name.description: Enter the name commonly used for the dataset.
name.example: LNWB Ch07 Water Management - Agricultural water use - date

alternateName.title: Alternate Dataset Name
alternateName.description: Enter an alternative name for the dataset.

url.title: Dataset URL or DOI URL
url.description: Enter the dataset's URL or DOI URL.
url.example: URL example: http://opencoredata.org/id/dataset/00cd2c07-ff21-4ceb-8595-c6572eda55e9 | DOI URL example: https://doi.org/10.7283/T5TM7881

description.title: Description
description.description: Provide a description of the dataset. The description can include anything you believe describes the dataset, e.g., type of data, its size, its location, etc.
description.example: Overview: Agricultural water use includes the irrigation of croplands and the water needs of dairy farms

version.title: Version
version.description: Enter the dataset version as either a date or a version number.
version.example: Date example: 2017-06-04 | Version Number example: v1.2.2

isAccessibleForFree.title: Accessible for Free
isAccessibleForFree.description: Indicate if the dataset is available for free by selecting this checkbox.

keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.description: Enter one or more keywords, with each keyword separated by a comma.
keywords.example: ocean acidification, OA, Dissolved Organic Carbon, DOC, bacterioplankton respiration, pCO2, carbon dioxide

license.title: Software License URL
license.description: Enter the URL for the dataset software license, which may be commercial, non-profit, or university.

citation.title: Citation
citation.description: Provide one or more citations for this dataset.
citation.example: Peter Spooner, Nivedita Thiagarajan, Weifu Guo, Katherine R. Hendry, Melanie J. Leng, Laura F. Robinson, Brad E. Rosenheim (2017), Clumped isotope composition of modern cold-water corals. Interdisciplinary Earth Data Alliance (IEDA). doi:10.1594/IEDA/10070

url.title: Data Catalog URL
url.description: Enter the URL for the data catalog.

distribution.title: Distribution
distribution.description: Provide information about the dataset's distribution online.

contentUrl.title: Dataset Download URL
contentUrl.description: Provide the URL for downloading the dataset file.

encodingFormat.title: File Type
encodingFormat.description: Select the type of file you are making available.

provider.title: Data Provider
provider.description: Provide information about the organization that has created the data.

legalName.title: Legal Name
legalName.description: Enter the name that is legally registered to the data provider.
legalName.example: Biological and Chemical Data Management Office

name.title: Common Name
name.description: Enter a name for the data provider that is commonly used. This may be a shortened version of the legal name.

url.title: URL or DOI URL
url.description: Enter the data provider's URL or DOI URL.

publisher.title: Publisher
publisher.description: Provide information about the organization maintaining the data catalog for distribution.

description.title: Description
description.description: Provide a description of the publisher, which could include its goal or purpose.

url.title: URL or DOI URL
url.description: Enter the publisher's URL or DOI URL. The publisher is the organization maintaining the data catalog for distribution.

name.title: Common Name
name.description: Enter a name for the publisher that is commonly used.

creator.title: Dataset Author (Role)
creator.description: Provide information about the role of the individual that created the dataset.

roleName.title: Type of Role
roleName.description: Enter the type of role(s) listed for the dataset author.

url.title: Author (Role) URL
url.description: Enter a URL for the web page that lists the dataset author's role.

creator.title: Dataset Author (Person)
creator.description: Provide information about the individual that created the dataset.

name.title: Full Name
name.description: Enter this dataset author's full name, including their credentials.

givenName.title: First Name
givenName.description: Enter this dataset author's first name.

familyName.title: Last Name
familyName.description: Enter this dataset author's last name.

url.title: Author (Person) URL
url.description: Enter a URL for the web page that provides information about this dataset author (person).

identifier.title: ORCID
identifier.description: ORCID is a standardized method often used by the scientific community to identify an individual. For example, if two individuals with the same name authored a paper, ORCID uniquely identifies the two authors.

url.title: ORCID URL
url.description: Enter the ORCID URL for this Dataset Author (Person).

value.title: ORCID Value
value.description: Enter the number value of the ORCID belonging to this Dataset Author (Person).

spatialCoverage.title: Spatial Coverage
spatialCoverage.description: Enter information about the geographical area where the dataset was collected.

name.title: Name of Place
name.description: Enter the name of the geographical area where the dataset was collected.
name.example: Falling Water Falls [3PP40] vertebrate fauna dataset

anyOf.title: Geographical Coordinates
anyOf.description: Enter a set of one or more individual geographical coordinate points.

anyOf.title: Geographical Shape
anyOf.description: Geographical shape is a way to identify spatial coverage using a bounding box and/or a polygon.

box.title: Bounding Box
box.description: Enter latitude and longitude coordinates for the bounding box, which is the entire shape of the geographical area.

polygon.title: Polygon Vertices
polygon.description: Enter a latitude and longitude for the points on the polygon.

variableMeasured.title: Measurements
variableMeasured.description: Describe what the numbers in this dataset mean.

@id.title: Measurement Description URL
@id.description: Enter the URL for the web page that describes this measurement.

description.title: Measurement Description
description.description: Enter a description of this measurement.

url.title: Measurement Description URL
url.description: Enter the URL for the web page that describes this measurement.

name.title: Measurement Name
name.description: Enter one or more names for this measurement, with each name separated by a comma.

unitText.title: Measurement Unit Descriptor
unitText.description: Describe the unit for this measurement.
unitText.example: meters, int64, string, parts per million (ppm)

measurementTechnique.title: Measurement Technique
measurementTechnique.description: Enter one or more measurement devices and techniques that were used to measure the variables in the dataset.
